originalTitle: More than 200 killed in mine collapse in DR Congo
title: More than 200 killed in mine collapse in DR Congo
content: The mine gave way after heavy rains on Wednesday, a local rebel spokesman says.

originalTitle: This army chief threatened to castrate opposition leader and claimed descent from Jesus
title: This army chief threatened to castrate opposition leader and claimed descent from Jesus
content: The Ugandan president’s son, notorious for explosive remarks on X, has ambitions to  succeed his father.

originalTitle: Mali lawmaker jailed in Ivory Coast for insulting president
title: Mali lawmaker jailed in Ivory Coast for insulting president
content: Prosecutors say Mamadou Hawa Gassama described Alassane Ouattara as a "tyrant" and "an enemy of Mali".

originalTitle: Peter Kornbluh: Is Trump pushing a new imperialism in Latin America?
title: Peter Kornbluh: Is Trump pushing a new imperialism in Latin America?
content: Peter Kornbluh speaks to Marc Lamont Hill on Trump’s abduction of Venezuela’s president and fallout for Latin America.

originalTitle: Tributes pour in for beloved actress Catherine O’Hara
title: Tributes pour in for beloved actress Catherine O’Hara
content: Actors and politicians honour O'Hara, who died this week at age 71, for her comedic 'brilliance' and generosity.

originalTitle: US envoy Witkoff says Ukraine talks with Russia ‘productive’
title: US envoy Witkoff says Ukraine talks with Russia ‘productive’
content: The talks come just a day before a second round of US-mediated talks between Russia and Ukraine in Abu Dhabi.

originalTitle: Takeaways from the millions of newly released Epstein files
title: Takeaways from the millions of newly released Epstein files
content: Three million new documents include hundreds of mentions of Trump and emails between Epstein and a person called "The Duke".

originalTitle: Federal judge denies request to block ICE surge in Minnesota
title: Federal judge denies request to block ICE surge in Minnesota
content: A judge said ICE activity could have "heartbreaking" effects but said the state hadn't proven its case.

originalTitle: Five killed in gas explosions in Iran, officials say
title: Five killed in gas explosions in Iran, officials say
content: A four-year-old is among the dead after separate blasts were reported on Saturday.

originalTitle: 'A great headache' - can Madueke stake claim for Arsenal and England?
title: 'A great headache' - can Madueke stake claim for Arsenal and England?
content: The sight of Noni Madueke flying past defenders and putting dangerous crosses into the penalty will have been a welcome sight for Mikel Arteta.

originalTitle: Teenager likened to Mbappe - Kroupi flourishing at Bournemouth
title: Teenager likened to Mbappe - Kroupi flourishing at Bournemouth
content: Eli Junior Kroupi's stunning goal for Bournemouth against Wolves will help soften the blow of losing Antoine Semenyo to Manchester City.

title: Iraola hails 'incredible' goalscoring teenager Kroupi
content: Bournemouth manager Andoni Iraola credits much of his side's recent improvment to "incredible" performances of Eli Junior Kroupi, as well as the depth brought in by new signings.
